Label.text: BiteBook is developed by Matthew Congrove and is available as open source at BiteBook.net
This application is built on the Appcelerator platform and uses the TiPebble module by Joe Beuckman

Special thanks to Chris Bowley, Joe Beuckman and Rick Blalock for their help, code and mentorship. Thanks also to the team at Pebble and the folks at XDA for sponsoring the development contest that led to this application
For saltwater logging (and regulations), please download the FishRules app for iOS or Android; we're BFFs
